Documentation

Install the Gradient Forge System

Use the CLI for the fastest setup or follow the manual path if you want total control.

Quick Install

Get started in seconds with a single command

npx
npx gradient-forge@latest init --inject
pnpm
pnpm dlx gradient-forge@latest init --inject
yarn
yarn dlx gradient-forge@latest init --inject
bun
bunx gradient-forge@latest init --inject

CLI Install

Recommended. Generates the theme system directly inside your project.

Use the published CLI for the best experience. This keeps your local project clean and works from anywhere.
npx gradient-forge@latest init --inject
1Run the CLI to scaffold theme assets
2Import the generated CSS in your globals
3Wrap your app with ThemeProvider
4Set theme classes on root element

What the CLI Adds

Files created inside your project root.

gradient-forge/theme-engine.ts
gradient-forge/theme-context.tsx
gradient-forge/themes.css
Preview Studio

CLI Options

Flags to control generation behavior.

--injectAdds theme CSS to app/globals.css
--no-injectKeeps globals.css unchanged
--pathTargets custom project root
--forceOverwrites existing files
--yesSkips prompts, uses defaults
--tuiArrow-key selector mode

Export Formats

Multiple formats to fit any workflow.

CSS Theme
SCSS
JSON Tokens
Tailwind
W3C Tokens
Figma

Required Root Setup

Make sure the root element carries theme classes.

<html class="dark theme-nitro-midnight-blurple" data-theme="theme-nitro-midnight-blurple" data-color-mode="dark">

Ready to create?

Head over to the Studio to explore themes and export tokens for your project.

Open Studio
